source_objects.title: Industry
source_objects.description: Break into new industries from healthcare, to veterinary medicine or event planning.

items.title: Microsoft Word 2019 (MO 100) Study Guide to 1000 points

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced and certified  Microsoft Office instructor
visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.title: Michael Carter

items.headline: Microsoft Office Specialist Word 2019 exam
objectives_summary: Microsoft Word
Taking an official Microsoft exam in Microsoft Word
Navigate in a Word document

items.title: Applied Petroleum Reservoir Engineering
items.headline: The Industry Standard For Reservoir Engineering Training.
objectives_summary: Apply the material balance approach to calculate hydrocarbon in place in all four reservoir types.
Calculate reservoir flow rates using Darcy's Law.
Match production history to a model and predict future production rates.

items.title: Overview of the oil and gas industry
items.headline: History and characteristics of petroleum, major events, players of the oil scene, consumption, production and forecast
objectives_summary: Gain a broad perspective of the global oil and gas industry and understand the role of oil in our life
Discover the history of the oil industry from its earliest development at the end of the 19th century to the current situation
Interpret the evolution of the factors affecting the energy supply and demand (crude prices, technology, reserves, geopolitics, geography, environment...)

items.title: Electrical Engineering - Understanding Alternating Current
items.headline: Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering - AC, Reactance, Impedance, Power, Power Factor, and Power Factor Correction.
objectives_summary: Understand the characteristics of alternating current.
Learn about Reactance and Reactive current.
Understand how to use Phasors to represent Sine waves.

items.title: The complete Personal Protective Equipment training
items.headline: A complete PPE course covering both regulatory, technical and managerial aspects.
objectives_summary: Understand the importance of PPE
Grasp an understanding of both OSHA and EU regulations
Determine both employer's and the employee's liabilites

items.title: Learn about Eastern Medicine and Energy Psychology
items.headline: Learn about the principles of Eastern Medicine and the definition of Energy Psychology and its basic schools.
objectives_summary: Learn about PTSD and an overview of Energy Psychology.
Learn about Eastern Medicine including the chakras and meridians.
Learn about Applied Kinesiology and the art of muscle testing.

items.title: Electrical Installations Design - Part 2
items.headline: Voltage Drop Test , Short Circuit Test , Thermal Rating Test , Cable Tray Sizing ,Design Group of Motors Panel
objectives_summary: Design Electrical Power Systems Networks
Testing Cables
Short Circuit Current Calculation

items.title: The steam cracking process - Petrochemicals / Oil and gas
items.headline: Discover the steam cracking process used to make the major building blocks for a variety of petrochemicals - oil and gas
objectives_summary: Comprehend the basic differences between petroleum refining and petrochemicals
Understand the basics of the steam cracker process
Identify the basics of the different building blocks of petrochemicals

items.title: Flow of Fluids Excel Workbook
items.headline: Assess flow of liquids and gases, calculate pressure drop, size pipes, control valves, orifice plates & flow meters
objectives_summary: Determine the main physical properties of fluids (viscosity, vapor pressure, specific gravity, weight density...)
Assess the theory of flow in pipe : Laminar vs Turbulent flow
Use the Bernoulli Theorem to calculate pressure drop, head loss or flow velocity

items.title: How to Succeed in your Security Career
items.headline: A Primer for Protection Professionals
objectives_summary: At the conclusion of this course, the learner will understand the evolving nature of private security and the role of the corporate security leader.
Learn how to identify various customer groups and manage their security expectations
Provide a holistic definition of modern corporate security

items.title: Reciprocating Compressors : Principles , Operation & Design
items.headline: A complete understanding of construction details and functioning of reciprocating compressors for a successful operation
objectives_summary: Understand the working principles of reciprocating compressors for a successful operation of your plant and piping system

Understand the construction details of reciprocating compressors for a successful maintenance and troubleshooting (crankshafts, bearings, crossheads, connecting rods, pistons, packings, rings, valves, unloaders...)
Perform various calculations to size and assess compressor performance (head, discharge temperature, inlet capacity, piston displacement, volumetric efficiency…)

items.title: GD&T Masterclass in Engineering Drawings and Blueprints

visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of a International consultancy business
visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.title: Andrew James

items.headline: Mechanical and Engineering Drawings and Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing
objectives_summary: How to read and understand the information contained within the drawing and blue print.
Drawing projections – first and third angle
In depth understanding of  Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing (GD&T).

items.title: Master Overview of a Career in Solar Sales

visible_instructors.title: David Sugrue
visible_instructors.job_title: The Ultimate Solar Sales Course Producer
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: Find out how to get involved in a career in selling solar energy!
objectives_summary: Understand how to start a solar energy business and how to sell solar.

items.title: Manufacturing Mastery with Production Planning and Control

visible_instructors.job_title: Lean Six Sigma and Quality Assurance Specialist
visible_instructors.name: Gunjan
visible_instructors.title: Gunjan Subedi

items.headline: Mastercourse for Learn Operations Management Product Management Lean manufacturing with Production Planning and Control
objectives_summary: Production Planning and Types of Planning, Forecasting demands of goods to be produced, Different Types of Production Layout, Planning for the Material flow inside the production premises, Plant Capacity Planning and Planning for the machine requirements, Finding the best Operating Conditions, Theory of Constraints and identifying the bottlenecks in production, Understanding the customers' requirements through House of Quality, Brainstorming and using affiliate diagrams for making necessary planning decisions, Materials Requirement Planning (MRP), Manufacturing Resource Planning (MRP II) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Mapping the production activity with Value Stream Maps, Identifying different types of wastes in the production process, Different lean tools used in Production Planning and Control

items.title: Piping Isometrics demystified through practical examples
items.headline: Learn how to draw the correct information from Piping Isometrics like a pro ( Pipe Fittings Flanges Valves Isos ...)
objectives_summary: Understand and evaluate the purpose, content, and importance of Piping Isometrics to the construction, commissionning,  operation and maintenance of a plant
Learn how to READ, INTERPRET and successfully UNDERSTAND ALL Piping Isometrics through numerous real industrial examples
Learn how to DRAW your own Piping Isometrics through numerous real industrial examples

items.title: Petroleum products : Specifications Properties Market Demand
items.headline: Deep knowledge of petroleum products : Properties Specifications Markets Demands and the Standard Quality Control Tests
objectives_summary: Grasp the main characteristics of petroleum products and their relevance for end-users
List the key properties for automotive fuels (now and in the future)
Identify recent changes and future trends for the petroleum products’ specifications, markets and demand
